content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu Wang,

Let's talk about the rental price. What is the rental price you are considering for this apartment? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Hello, the rent I have in mind for this apartment is 1000 Euros per month.

What is your offer? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: My offer is 1200 Euros per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I see. As the apartment is in the city center, I believe the rent of 1000 Euros is reasonable. However, I am willing to go up to 950 Euros. 

What is your counter-offer? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: My counter-offer is 1100 Euros per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Considering the apartment's location and condition, I can increase the rent to 980 Euros. 

What is your counter-offer? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: My counter-offer is 1080 Euros per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand your point. I am willing to lower the rent to 960 Euros. 

What is your counter-offer? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: My counter-offer is 1020 Euros per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I appreciate your effort, but I cannot go higher than 950 Euros. 

What is your counter-offer? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: My counter-offer is 1000 Euros per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price. Do not mention anything about the apartment's size, location, or facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
